# Platelets {#sec-platelet}

Platelets testing includes:

* Platelet count\
Normal is 150-400×10^9^/L.
* Platelet function testing


## Abnormalities

* **Thrombocytopaenia**
	* Causes include:
		* Artifactual\
		Clumping of platelets in an inadequately anticoagulated tube.
		* ↑ Consumption
			* Extracorporeal circulation
			* DIC
			* Haemorrhage
			* Post-transfusion
			* Pre-eclampsia
			* MAHA
				* TTP/HUS
			* Immune
				* HITT
				* APS
				* SLE
		* ↓ Production
			* Drugs
				* Alcohol
				* Linezolid
=			* Bone marrow disease
				* Myelofibrosis
				* Aplastic anaemia
			* Malignancy
				* Bone marrow infiltration
				* Haematological malignancy
			* Infection
				* Viral\
				HIV, EBV, Hepatitis C, mumps, rubella, VZV.
			* Nutritional deficiency
		* Sequestration
			* Hypersplenism
			* Hypothermia
